name: Zombie Turret
description:
Oh No The Zombies Are Coming Quick Load The Turret!

A Game Made In Scratch!

Note: This game is Made For Fun And Is not Made seriously So If you thought on wanting to Ask if you can Donate Just don't And the game Is On Scratch you can go check it out by searching For Zombie Turret in Scratch website it was There before i put it here in itch.io Btw i Used some weird software to make it into an HTML File So thats why it has a weird thing on the side its the stop and start and Fullscreen button that doesn't work idk why its there

This game is supported on all types of devices
It took me some googling to know What A linux device is lol
